messages.subject: RECENT UPDATES - Samurai Archives Japanese History Page
messages.msgSnippet: Updates as of 11-23-00 samurai archives japanese history page www.techjapanese.com/samurai/ ... 23 new readings for Samurai names have been added to the
messages.messageBody:
Updates as of 11-23-00
samurai archives japanese history page
www.techjapanese.com/samurai/
----------------------

23 new readings for Samurai names have been added to the 'Japanese
Kanji Names' section:
http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/kanji.html

A new section, 'Famous Sengoku Generals' has been added, with details
on generals of the Mori, Oda, Takeda, and Uesugi:
http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/famousgenerals.html

The first 'official' Samurai Archives desktop wallpaper is now
availabe. Anyone with free time and any interest is HIGHLY
ENCOURAGED to create MORE WALLPAPER!! The creator will of course be
given full credit. Please email kitsuno@... with any
questions.
http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/downloads.html

A translation of information on Imagawa Ujitoyo has been added to
the 'historical figures' section of 'translations':
http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/trans.html

And don't forget to stop by the Samurai history forum on
Delphi.com - join in the conversation, feel free to post any
questions or comments related to japanese history:
http://www.delphi.com/samuraihistory/
